articles.description: All of the Pokémon Go Wild Area 2025 research tasks for both the Lurking Dark and Fanciful Fairy habitat hours,
articles.content:
The Wild Area 2025 research tasks can be collected by spinning PokéStops during the Wild Area 2025: Global event in Pokémon Go.
While similar to the regular seasonal field research tasks in Pokémon … [+3187 chars]
